price: 197 Jouissance éphémère pour ces êtres voués à l’Enfer. Et quelle horrible demeure !
arabic: مَتَٰعٞ قَلِيلٞ ثُمَّ مَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمِهَادُ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: matāʿun qalīlun thumma mawāhum jahannamu wabi'sa al-mihādu
